mapper.sql: oid, osn, uid, orderstate, productamount, orderamount, surplusmoney, parentid, isreview, addtime, shipsn, shipsystemname, shipfriendname, shiptime, paysn, paysystemname, payfriendname, paymode, paytime, regionid, consignee, mobile, phone, email, zipcode, address, besttime, shipfee, handlingCost, payfee, fullcut, discount, paycreditcount, paycreditmoney, couponmoney, weight, buyerremark, ip, beginDate, endDate, factoryAddress, storeAddress, paystate, salerid, needinv, userrole, remark,expireTime,ncordernum,ncstate
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bsp_orders
order by ${orderByClause}

update bsp_orders
oid = #{record.oid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
osn = #{record.osn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderstate = #{record.orderstate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
productamount = #{record.productamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

besttime = #{record.besttime,jdbcType=DATE},

update bsp_orders
osn = #{osn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderstate = #{orderstate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
productamount = #{productamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
orderamount = #{orderamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
surplusmoney = #{surplusmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isreview = #{isreview,jdbcType=TINYINT},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shipsn = #{shipsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipsystemname = #{shipsystemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipfriendname = #{shipfriendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shiptime = #{shiptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paysn = #{paysn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paysystemname = #{paysystemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payfriendname = #{payfriendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymode = #{paymode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
paytime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zipcode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
besttime = #{besttime,jdbcType=DATE},
shipfee = #{shipfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
handlingCost = #{handlingcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payfee = #{payfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fullcut = #{fullcut,jdbcType=INTEGER},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paycreditcount = #{paycreditcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paycreditmoney = #{paycreditmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
couponmoney = #{couponmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
buyerremark = #{buyerremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginDate = #{begindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factoryAddress = #{factoryaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storeAddress = #{storeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paystate = #{paystate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salerid = #{salerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
needinv = #{needinv,jdbcType=CHAR},
userrole = #{userrole,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expireTime = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE},
ncordernum = #{ncordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ncstate = #{ncstate,jdbcType=CHAR},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

userrole = #{userrole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expireTime = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, ncordernum = #{ncordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ncstate = #{ncstate,jdbcType=CHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from bsp_orders where uid=${UID} and userrole = 1 and ncstate = 0

SELECT c.productId pid, c.count count, p.name name, p.showimg showimg, prp.price marketprice, prp.type type, p.weight FROM bsp_cart c, bsp_products p, bsp_productsregions pr, bsp_productsregionsprice prp WHERE c.productId = p.pid AND p.pid = pr.productId AND pr.Id = prp.productregionsId AND prp.priceType = 1 AND c.userId = #{userId} AND pr.RegionsId = #{regionId}

SELECT prp.price shipFee,prp2.price handlingCost,prp.type FROM bsp_productsregions pr, bsp_productsregionsprice prp, bsp_productsregionsprice prp2 WHERE pr.Id = prp.productregionsId and pr.Id = prp2.productregionsId and prp.priceType=2 and prp2.priceType=3 and prp.type = prp2.type and pr.RegionsId=#{regionsId}
SELECT price FROM bsp_productsregions p, bsp_productsregionsprice psp WHERE p.Id = psp.productregionsId and psp.priceType =1 and p.productId = #{productId} and p.regionsId = #{regionsId}
SELECT ps.number FROM bsp_productstocks AS ps where ps.pid = #{productId}

SELECT price FROM bsp_productsregions pr, bsp_productsregionsprice prp WHERE pr.Id = prp.productregionsId AND pr.RegionsId = #{regionId} AND prp.priceType = #{priceType} AND prp.type = #{type} and productId <=0 limit 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bsp_cart WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM bsp_orderproducts WHERE bsp_cart.productId = bsp_orderproducts.pid AND bsp_orderproducts.uid = bsp_cart.userId AND bsp_orderproducts.oid = #{oid} )
mapper.select: SELECT prp.price cost,prp.buyminquan buyminquan FROM bsp_productsregions pr, bsp_productsregionsprice prp WHERE pr.Id = prp.productregionsId AND pr.productId = #{productId} AND pr.regionsId = #{regionsId} AND prp.priceType = #{priceType} group by prp.buyminquan
SELECT count(*) from bsp_products c where c.pid = #{pid}
SELECT * FROM bsp_productattributes WHERE attrid = '51' and pid = #{pid}
select * from bsp_orders where salerid=${SALER_ID} order by oid desc limit ${START_NUM},${LIMIT_NUM}
select count(*) from bsp_orders where salerid=${SALER_ID} order by oid desc limit ${START_NUM},${LIMIT_NUM}
